mapper.select: select * from ( select A.E_name, B.write_date, B.ranking, B.comments, B.userid, B.reserveNumber from restaurant A, review B where A.RESTAURANT_NUMBER = B.RESTAURANT_NUMBER ) V where V.userid = #{userid} order by write_Date desc
mapper.update: update reserve set reviewCheck = '1' where reserveNumber = #{reserveNumber}
